text: Yes, your writing does include instructions! It provides a structured overview of what needs to be done for the poster about the circulatory system, detailing key components such as purpose, organs and their functions, diagrams, relationships to other body systems, medical problems, and interesting facts. Each step outlines specific requirements and elements to be included. If you have any specific parts you want to focus on or clarify, feel free to ask! ğŸ˜Š
